summary: The speaker expresses frustration with the inconvenience of eating, including grocery shopping, cooking, and consuming meals. They mention disliking the process of deciding what to eat, preparing meals, and even eating itself. The speaker also references having ADHD, which makes feeding themselves challenging due to their inability to eat when not in the mood. They express a desire to avoid eating altogether, suggesting that they would prefer not to deal with the complexities and difficulties associated with food consumption.
keywords: eating, inconvenient, grocery shopping, cooking, ADHD, neurodivergent, meal prep, taxes, bills, food, poison, grown-up responsibilities
creator_demographic: Age: Unknown, Gender: Unknown, Geographic Location: Unknown
